name: Return of the Back Alley Wizard
author: 도한
content: Aster, a troublemaker from the Dequlan family of magicians, who used to be a vagrant. He runs away for freedom, but is eventually caught and loses his life.But when he opens his eyes, he finds himself back in his vagrant days in the black-and-white zone...!“I will build the library that was my comrades&#039 dream, no, I will build a tower even greater than that!”“As a bonus, I will display the Deculanga Vision Book on the first floor.”Aster&#039s return to life as a vagabond!
